column6: passed away tuesday at home surrounded by his loving family. he was an army air corp veteran of world war ii where he served as a medic. frank was co-owner of cottets welding supply
column7: an experienced businessman and a master welder. he was a member of lakeshore yacht & country club
column8: calvary club and atlantis golf club in florida. frank held the title of club champion at both lakeshore yacht & country club and the calvary club. he was predeceased by his parents
column13: clyola fudesco and seven brothers and sisters
column19: lena and his twin sister mary. she and frank were the youngest. frank is survived by his loving wife
column21: frank d. and his wife linnea fudesco of new orleans; three grandchildren
column22: frank michael fudesco and his wife ronda
column23: mia fudesco and dominick fudesco; his great-granddaughter
column32: and cousins. a funeral mass in celebration of franks life will be held at 10:00 am on saturday
column35: dewitt. entombment will follow in assumption cemetery mausoleum. family and friends may call from 4:00 to 6:00 pm on friday
